description: A highly visual interactive document on the First World War Gallipoli campaign. Containing hundreds of images, documents, music and various footage from 1915 makes this virtual tour ideal for schools. This CD-ROM is broken up into various historical aspects and is set up to play on both PC and Mac computers - all you need is a web browser such as Internet Explorer or Netscape. For PC users, Internet Explorer 5 can be installed from the CD.
